assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
